text: Alexey Vasiliyevich Gordeyev (; born 28 February 1955) is a Russian politician who served as Member and Deputy Speaker of the State Duma.[https://ria.ru/20200213/1564648251.html Госдума утвердила Гордеева вице- спикером палаты] Previously he was the Deputy Prime Minister of Russia from 2000 to 2004 and from 2018 to 2020, Governor of Voronezh Oblast from 2009 to 2017 and Agriculture Minister of Russia from 1999 to 2009. ==References== ==External links== * Personal website of Alexey Gordeyev Category:1955 births Category:People from Frankfurt (Oder) Category:Governors of Voronezh Oblast Category:United Russia politicians Category:21st-century Russian politicians Category:Living people Category:Grand Crosses with Star and Sash of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:Academicians of the Russian Academy of Agriculture Sciences Category:Recipients of the Order "For Merit to the Fatherland", 3rd class Category:Recipients of the Order of Honour (Russia) Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order "For Merit to the Fatherland" II class Category:Agriculture ministers of Russia Category:Deputy heads of government of the Russian Federation
title: Alexey Gordeyev
